title: Builder Templates
description: Create a new scene preconfigured with one of the following builders. Each builder generates a different type of a dungeon

cards.title: Grid Flow Builder
cards.desc: Design and control the flow of your dungeons with this powerful new builder

cards.title: Snap Flow Builder
cards.desc: Design the flow of your dungeon using graph grammars and stitch together existing room prefabs

cards.title: Snap Grid Flow Builder
cards.desc: Stitch Snap modules using the grid flow framework in a 3D grid

cards.title: Grid Builder
cards.desc: Build a dungeon on a grid based system with support for stairs

cards.title: Simple City
cards.desc: Build a simple city with roads, houses, parks, city walls, foliage etc

cards.title: Isaac Builder
cards.desc: Build levels like in the game Binding of Isaac

cards.title: Floor Planner
cards.desc: Create floor plans. Ideal for creating interior of buildings
